name: CycloneDX
help: CycloneDX is a lightweight software bill-of-material (SBOM) specification designed for use in application security contexts and supply chain component analysis.

properties.name: Path
properties.help: The path to a .sln, .csproj, .vbproj, or packages.config file or the path to a directory which will be recursively analyzed for packages.config files.

properties.name: AlternativeNuGetUrl
properties.help: Alternative NuGet repository URL to v3-flatcontainer API (a trailing slash is required).

properties.name: Recursive
properties.help: To be used with a single project file, it will recursively scan project references of the supplied .csproj.

properties.name: NoSerialNumber
properties.help: Optionally omit the serial number from the resulting BOM.
